DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate effectiveness group intervention nutritional profile , stress quality life patient cardiopulmonary rehabilitation . Method : Randomized clinical trial use semi-structured interview , sociodemographic anthropometric data collection , 164 participant divide control group intervention group , Food Frequency Questionnaire , Lipp Adult Stress Symptom Inventory ( ISSL ) ) And SF-12 Quality Life Assessment Questionnaire . To verify difference nutritional profile , stress level quality life group , chi-square test use categorical variable within group comparison moment MC Nemar test . In quantitative variable evaluation interaction group time Variance Analysis use design Repeated Measures . Considering significance level p < 0.05 . Expected Results : It believe psychological nutritional intervention patient participate therapeutic group help elaborate question regard difficulty cop disease daily routine understand importance lifestyle care healthy habit .
DOC.brief_title: Group Intervention Nutritional Profile , Stress Quality Life Patients Cardiopulmonary Rehabilitation
